definitions: the state or process that occurs when no more of something can be absorbed, combined with, or added

examples.text: the springs on the left slope of the hill lie below the level of permanent saturation

shortDefinitions: state of being saturated or action of saturating

definitions: the degree or extent to which something is dissolved or absorbed compared with the maximum possible, usually expressed as a percentage

examples.text: this mixture should give a reading of 45 to 50 percent saturation

shortDefinitions: degree or extent to which something is dissolved or absorbed compared with maximum possible

definitions: to a very full extent, especially beyond the point regarded as necessary or desirable
(especially in photography) the intensity of a color, expressed as the degree to which it differs from white.
shortDefinitions: intensity of colour, expressed as degree to which it differs from white
